fields.name: ContentVersion
fields.description: If included, must match the ContentVersion in the template.

fields.name: Id
fields.description: The resource id of a Template Spec. Use either the id or uri property, but not both.

fields.name: RelativePath
fields.description: Applicable only if this template link references a Template Spec. This relativePath property can optionally be used to reference a Template Spec artifact by path.

fields.name: Uri
fields.description: The URI of the template to deploy. Use either the uri or id property, but not both.
